title: flake8==3.0.4 - FailedToLoadPlugin: Flake8 failed to load plugin "D" due to 'module' object has no attribute 'Error'.
body:
In GitLab by @fernandog on Sep 30, 2016, 06:01

Travis is failing with the following error:

Setting up build cache
$ python --version
Python 2.7.9
$ pip --version
pip 6.0.7 from /home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/lib/python2.7/site-packages (python 2.7)

```
$ tox -v --recreate
using tox.ini: /home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/tox.ini
using tox-2.3.1 from /home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tox/__init__.pyc
py27 create: /home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/.tox/tox
  /home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/.tox$ /home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/bin/python -m virtualenv --python /home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/bin/python2.7 tox >/home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/.tox/tox/log/py27-0.log
py27 installdeps: flake8_docstrings, flake8-import-order, pep8-naming, pytest, pytest-cov, pytest-flake8, PyYAML, mock
  /home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage$ /home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/.tox/tox/bin/pip install flake8_docstrings flake8-import-order pep8-naming pytest pytest-cov pytest-flake8 PyYAML mock >/home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/.tox/tox/log/py27-1.log
  /home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage$ /home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/.tox/tox/bin/pip freeze >/home/travis/build/pymedusa/SickRage/.tox/tox/log/py27-2.log
py27 installed: configparser==3.5.0,coverage==4.2,enum34==1.1.6,flake8==3.0.4,flake8-docstrings==1.0.2,flake8-import-order==0.9.2,funcsigs==1.0.2,mccabe==0.5.2,mock==2.0.0,pbr==1.10.0,pep8-naming==0.4.1,py==1.4.31,pycodestyle==2.0.0,pydocstyle==1.1.0,pyflakes==1.2.3,pytest==3.0.3,pytest-cov==2.3.1,pytest-flake8==0.6,PyYAML==3.12,six==1.10.0
py27 runtests: commands[0] | py.test -p no:cov -p no:unittest --flake8
platform linux2 -- Python 2.7.9, pytest-3.0.3, py-1.4.31, pluggy-0.4.0
```

```
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pytest_flake8.py:82: in runtest
    check_file, self.fspath, self.flake8ignore, self.maxlength)
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/py/_io/capture.py:150: in call
    res = func(*args, **kwargs)
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pytest_flake8.py:139: in check_file
    app.find_plugins()
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/flake8/main/application.py:143: in find_plugins
    self.check_plugins.load_plugins()
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/flake8/plugins/manager.py:385: in load_plugins
    plugins = list(self.manager.map(load_plugin))
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/flake8/plugins/manager.py:277: in map
    yield func(self.plugins[name], *args, **kwargs)
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/flake8/plugins/manager.py:383: in load_plugin
    return plugin.load_plugin()
.tox/tox/lib/python2.7/site-packages/flake8/plugins/manager.py:183: in load_plugin
    raise failed_to_load
E   FailedToLoadPlugin: Flake8 failed to load plugin "D" due to 'module' object has no attribute 'Error'.
```
